programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. programme.title: Окно жизни
programme.desc: Славик и Надежда оказываются жертвами квартирных аферистов, поэтому после рождения второго ребёнка они вынуждены жить с семьёй Славика. Его сестра Алёна недовольна таким соседством. Славик уезжает на заработки. Пользуясь тем, что Славик в коме, Алёна выгоняет Надежду с детьми из квартиры. После длительных скитаний Надежда оставляет младенца в бэби-боксе. Соколова и Борадзе предлагают Глаше уволиться по собственному желанию. Борадзе сообщает коллективу о том, что подкидыша усыновила семья Нескоромовых. Коллектив перинатального центра прощается с Милославской - сердце коллеги остановилось. Славик выходит из комы, Алёна признается ему в своем вранье.

programme.title: Окно жизни
programme.desc: Славик и Надежда оказываются жертвами квартирных аферистов, поэтому после рождения второго ребёнка они вынуждены жить с семьёй Славика. Его сестра Алёна недовольна таким соседством. programme.title: Жених
programme.desc: Главный герой безумно любит свою жену, красавицу. Она же постоянно изменяет ему и… рожает почти каждый год по ребенку.. Всех детей Валера растит как родных. Он им и отец, и мать. Однажды Люся исчезает из дому вовсе, встретив "новую любовь"- иностранца… В тот же год с Голубевым случается горе… Как сложится судьба одинокого многодетного отца и его малышей? Что станет с беспутной мамашей на чужбине? Это история любви, предательства, прощения, а еще — преодоления себя.

programme.title: Дневники Темного
programme.desc: Телеканал ТЕТ подготовил для вас нечто очень неожиданное. Проект придется по вкусу всем любителям загадочных мистических историй. События происходят в фантастическом городе Темный. В нем живут вампиры, оборотни и другие существа. Все здесь живет и дышит, даже стены домов. Попасть в этот загадочный город совсем не сложно, а вот покинуть - невероятно сложно. Однажды в город приезжает журналист. Его задача - освещать события, происходящие в Темном. Однако все осложняется тем, что отличить где правда, а где только галлюцинации, в городе бывает невероятно трудно. В каждом выпуске он расследует новые мистические дела. Удастся ли ему раскрыть их и спасти жизни людей? Сможет ли журналист выжить в таинственном городе? А выбраться из него? - Узнавайте в мистическом сериалы "Дневники Темного".

programme.title: Дневники Темного

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Окно жизни
programme.desc: Славик и Надежда оказываются жертвами квартирных аферистов, поэтому после рождения второго ребёнка они вынуждены жить с семьёй Славика. Его сестра Алёна недовольна таким соседством. Славик уезжает на заработки. Пользуясь тем, что Славик в коме, Алёна выгоняет Надежду с детьми из квартиры. После длительных скитаний Надежда оставляет младенца в бэби-боксе. Соколова и Борадзе предлагают Глаше уволиться по собственному желанию. Борадзе сообщает коллективу о том, что подкидыша усыновила семья Нескоромовых. Коллектив перинатального центра прощается с Милославской - сердце коллеги остановилось. Славик выходит из комы, Алёна признается ему в своем вранье.

programme.title: Окно жизни
programme.desc: Славик и Надежда оказываются жертвами квартирных аферистов, поэтому после рождения второго ребёнка они вынуждены жить с семьёй Славика. Его сестра Алёна недовольна таким соседством. programme.title: В последний раз прощаюсь
programme.desc: Жарким летним днем 24-летний Андрей спасает тонущую школьницу Веру. Девушка безответно влюбляется в своего спасителя, а тот видит в ней лишь маленькую застенчивую девчонку. Вскоре Андрей уезжает в город и женится на своей ровеснице. А у Веры остаются его рисунки, медальон и щенок Джим, которого они вместе спасли. Прошли годы, из неуклюжей девчонки Вера превратилась в успешную и яркую женщину, открыла свой бизнес, вышла замуж. Тем не менее счастливой она так и не стала. Однажды Вера встречает Андрея в ветклинике, но не признается, что она - та самая Вера. Однако вскоре проблемы с бизнесом и предательство мужа рушат ее налаженную жизнь. И в трудную минуту, как и много лет назад, Андрей приходит к ней на помощь.

programme.title: В последний раз прощаюсь
programme.desc: Жарким летним днем 24-летний Андрей спасает тонущую школьницу Веру. Девушка безответно влюбляется в своего спасителя, а тот видит в ней лишь маленькую застенчивую девчонку. programme.title: Преданная
programme.desc: История начинается в Станиславе во второй половине XIX века. Доктор Ангер теряет в пожаре жену, но удается спасти двух девушек – родную дочь Аделю и дочь своих работников Стефанию. Доктор решает воспитывать их вместе. Проходит 25 лет. Девушки выросли и так же неразлучны, хотя Аделя теперь замужем. Стефа же ведет хозяйство, утоляя свою страсть в кулинарии. Но они до сих пор не понимают, кто они друг другу: сестры и подруги или служанка и хозяйка.

programme.title: Дневники Темного
programme.desc: Телеканал ТЕТ подготовил для вас нечто очень неожиданное. Проект придется по вкусу всем любителям загадочных мистических историй. События происходят в фантастическом городе Темный. В нем живут вампиры, оборотни и другие существа. Все здесь живет и дышит, даже стены домов. Попасть в этот загадочный город совсем не сложно, а вот покинуть - невероятно сложно. Однажды в город приезжает журналист. Его задача - освещать события, происходящие в Темном. Однако все осложняется тем, что отличить где правда, а где только галлюцинации, в городе бывает невероятно трудно. В каждом выпуске он расследует новые мистические дела. Удастся ли ему раскрыть их и спасти жизни людей? Сможет ли журналист выжить в таинственном городе? А выбраться из него? - Узнавайте в мистическом сериалы "Дневники Темного".

programme.title: Дневники Темного

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Noble Things
programme.desc: Jimmy Wayne Collins finds himself adrift in Memphis, Tennessee. Forced to return home to the piney woods of Southeast Texas, Jimmy will face his imprisoned brother, his dying father and the demons he left behind.

programme.title: Extract
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Kristen Wiig, Ben Affleck and Mila Kunis star in Mike Judges workplace comedy. Joel Reynolds (Bateman) is the founder of a company that produces and bottles flavour extracts. His marital love life has flatlined, but he cant bring himself to cheat on his wife Suzie (Wiig), until his friend Dean (Affleck) convinces him to hire a gigolo to seduce her, thus freeing Joel to also play the field. This will prove to be a worse idea than it sounds. But that will be the least of his worries, as a horrific accident in the bottling plant, a grifting employee (Kunis), an aggressive lawyer (Gene Simmons) and striking workers bring his company to its knees...

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Modigliani
programme.desc: American drama, produced in 2004. An American, French, German, Italian, Rumanian, and British co-production. The story of Amedeo Modiglianis bitter rivalry with Pablo Picasso, and his tragic romance with Jeanne Hebuterne.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: Score: A Hockey Musical
programme.desc: Seventeen-year-old Farley has led a sheltered life, raised on a diet of home schooling, organic living and trips to the art gallery. To his parents dismay, Farley loves to play hockey with the local kids. To their even greater dismay, Farley is scouted and signed by the owner of a junior league team, where he becomes an instant star. But Farley discovers that stardom comes with a price - including the expectation to fight on the ice. Throw in a changing relationship with his best friend, and Farley finds himself losing his way.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Jungle Boy
programme.desc: In a humble village on the edge of the jungle, a young boy strays from his mother to play with a monkey. Lost in the jungle, he is saved by the great elephant, who will raise him as a member of the great family of animals. When he grows up he helps to protect the jungle from a ruthless poacher.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: North and South: The Battle of New Market
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Wings Of Eagles
programme.desc: The continuing true story of Eric Liddells glorious life after winning Olympic gold in the 1924 Paris Olympics. Liddell has returned to China, where he was born to missionary parents, modestly avoiding celebrity in order to teach local schoolchildren. In 1937, the Japanese invade China at the outset of WWll. Liddell with his friend Xu Niu, a street smart resistance fighter, recognize the increasing danger so Liddell sends his wife, Florence and their two daughters to safety in Canada. Duty-bound, Liddell stays to minister to the civilian victims. Liddell and other foreign nationals are taken as prisoners and placed in one of the many Japanese internment camps where they are forced to endure for two years. Before the Japanese surrender, Liddell succumbs to a brain tumor. Yet his message of hope became immortal. Eric Liddells legacy continues to this day as he remains admired as a champion for life.

programme.title: Cookies Fortune
programme.desc: Cookies Fortune unfolds over an eventful Easter weekend in the small town of Holly Springs, Mississippi. The town residents are peaceful, kind folk--with the exception of Camille Dixon (Glenn Close) - a pushy theatre director with an incredibly shy younger sister, Cora (Julianne Moore), whose estranged daughter Emma (Liv Tyler) has just returned to town. On the heels of her latest play, Camille is shocked to discover that her Aunt Jewel Mae "Cookie" Orcutt (Patricia Neal) has committed suicide. Terrified at the thought of how this will tarnish the family name, she eats the suicide note to make it look like a burglary. This set-up leads the police to one main suspect, Willis Richland (Charles S. Dutton), who also happens to be Cookies best friend. Although the rest of the town is convinced Willis didnt commit the crime, an outside investigator (Courtney B. Vance) isnt so sure. As Easter Sunday and opening night of the play arrive, the truth comes out, revealing more secrets than anyone could have possibly imagined.

programme.title: Hit List
programme.desc: Charlotte is a woman with anger management issues whose therapist suggests she write a journal to keep her emotions in check. Unlucky in love, she ventures online to find a boyfriend. Just as she reaches her limit of unsuccessful dates, Charlotte meets her soul mate Lyle. Everything is perfect until Lyle finds Charlottes journal and sets out to prove just how deeply he loves her.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: Existenz
programme.desc: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. With no formal experience or education to speak of, she must rely on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Nico the Unicorn
programme.desc: A 12-year-old disabled boy, whose father recently passed away, has his life changed when the pony he rescues gives birth to a unicorn. Can he save the unicorn from the people who want to exploit it?

programme.title: Irish Jam
programme.desc: A South Central L.A. con artist with rap skills tries to keep bill collectors and his lover, with marriage in mind, at bay by entering a poetry contest staged by a small Irish town. Can his rhyming skills help the town and win him the prize money?

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: The story of a compulsive bureaucrat, Orson, who discovers a secret room.

programme.title: The War Is Over
programme.desc: Following the bombardment of Kosovo in 1999, the Rahmanis and their three children emigrate to Switzerland. After years of living in their new homeland, the family faces the prospects of deportation. "No one is proud to be a refugee, but when it comes to me, I am not ashamed of who I am" says Rasim - the father of the family and an ex music teacher. Desperate to stay he invents an Albanian Dance Troupe in order to garner signatures of support from the community… The intimate narrative explores the experience of forced migration: the fraught decision to leave; the process of integration and adaptation to a new country; the impact on the family; and always, the yearning for the homeland.

programme.title: Cleanskin
programme.desc: Thriller. Thriller, produced in 2012. Co-produced by the USA and the UK. A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

programme.title: The Flock
programme.desc: This film is about a hyper-vigilant employee of the department of public safety who, while training his young female replacement, has to track down a missing girl who he is convinced is connected to a paroled sex offender he is investigating.

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: Mirdzums
programme.desc: Ģimene dodas uz nomaļu viesnīcu pārziemot, kur kāda draudīga klātbūtne ietekmē tēvu un noved viņu pie vardarbības. Viņa psihiskais dēls redz šausminošas priekšnojautas gan no pagātnes, gan nākotnes.

programme.title: Aplaupīt 30 minūtēs
programme.desc: Niks ir picu piegādātājs, kura dzīve sagriežas kājām gaidā brīdī, kad divi viltīgi bandīti saņem viņu gūstā, piestiprina viņam spridzekli un uzdod aplaupīt banku. Tieši dienā, kad viņš sastrīdējies ar savu labāko draugu.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Saulains kajaka brauciens.

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Mirdzums
programme.desc: Ģimene dodas uz nomaļu viesnīcu pārziemot, kur kāda draudīga klātbūtne ietekmē tēvu un noved viņu pie vardarbības. Viņa psihiskais dēls redz šausminošas priekšnojautas gan no pagātnes, gan nākotnes.

programme.title: Paspēt laikā
programme.desc: Topošais tētis Pīters atrodas uz nervu sabrukuma robežas, kā arī vairāku tūkstošu kilometru attālumā no savas sievas, kurai ir palikušas piecas dienas līdz bērna nākšanai pasaulē. Un Pītera nerviem galīgi nenāk par labu apstāklis, ka garajā un neprātīgajā ceļojumā, kas viņam būs jāveic, par viņa kompanjonu kļūst godkārīgais aktieris Ītans.

programme.title: Aplaupīt 30 minūtēs
programme.desc: Niks ir picu piegādātājs, kura dzīve sagriežas kājām gaidā brīdī, kad divi viltīgi bandīti saņem viņu gūstā, piestiprina viņam spridzekli un uzdod aplaupīt banku. Tieši dienā, kad viņš sastrīdējies ar savu labāko draugu.

programme.title: Mirdzums
programme.desc: Ģimene dodas uz nomaļu viesnīcu pārziemot, kur kāda draudīga klātbūtne ietekmē tēvu un noved viņu pie vardarbības. Viņa psihiskais dēls redz šausminošas priekšnojautas gan no pagātnes, gan nākotnes.

programme.title: Paspēt laikā
programme.desc: Topošais tētis Pīters atrodas uz nervu sabrukuma robežas, kā arī vairāku tūkstošu kilometru attālumā no savas sievas, kurai ir palikušas piecas dienas līdz bērna nākšanai pasaulē. Un Pītera nerviem galīgi nenāk par labu apstāklis, ka garajā un neprātīgajā ceļojumā, kas viņam būs jāveic, par viņa kompanjonu kļūst godkārīgais aktieris Ītans.

programme.title: Oušena banda
programme.desc: Šarmantais Denijs Oušens laiku velti netērē. Nav vēl pagājušas 24 stundas kopš viņš atbrīvots pret galvojumu no Ņūdžersijas labošanas iestādes, kad viņa galvā tiek perināts kārtējais aplaupīšanas plāns. Šoreiz Denijs organizē vissarežģītāko un izsmalcinātāko kazino aplaupīšanu kādu pasaule jebkad pieredzējusi. Vienas nakts laikā viņš savāc uzticamu vienpadsmit cilvēku komandu, lai aplaupītu trīs populārākos Lasvegasas kazino, kuru īpašnieks ir elegantais un nežēlīgais Terijs Benedikts un kurš satiekas ar Denija bijušo sievu Tesu. Sakritība vai motīvs? Galvenajās lomās: Džordžs Klūnijs, Džūlija Robertsa, Breds Pits.

programme.title: Laika patruļa
programme.desc: Pagaidu aģentu (Ītans Houks) nosūta atpakaļ laikā, lai notvertu teroristu, pirms viņš detonē vairākus spridzekļus un nogalina tūkstošiem nevainīgu cilvēku. Meklējot slepkavu, slepenais aģents kļūst par bārmeni. Bārā viņš iepazīstas ar kādu klientu (Sāra Snūka), kurš izstāsta, kā viņš ticis uzaudzināts kā sieviete un ka viņam atņemts bērns. Kad aģents piedāvā šim cilvēkam atgriezties pagātnē un atrast sava bērna tēvu, klients piekrīt. Abi kopā dodas atpakaļ laikā, lai atriebtu savu pagātni.

programme.title: Ceļojums uz Ameriku
programme.desc: Pirms daudziem gadiem Āfrikas valsts karalis Akīms devās uz Ameriku princeses - sievas meklējumos. Toreiz viņš kopā ar draugu labi uzdzīvoja, un nu savā 30 gadu kāzu jubilejā uzzina, ka Amerikā viņam ir dēls. Tā kā valsts tradīcijas nosaka, ka troni mantot var tikai karaļa dēls, bet Akīmam ir divas meitas, viņš dodas uz Ameriku dēla meklējumos! Un jauni piedzīvojumi var sākties. Galvenajās lomās: Edijs Mērfijs, Arsenio Hols, Šeri Hedlija

programme.title: Oušena banda
programme.desc: Šarmantais Denijs Oušens laiku velti netērē. Nav vēl pagājušas 24 stundas kopš viņš atbrīvots pret galvojumu no Ņūdžersijas labošanas iestādes, kad viņa galvā tiek perināts kārtējais aplaupīšanas plāns. Šoreiz Denijs organizē vissarežģītāko un izsmalcinātāko kazino aplaupīšanu kādu pasaule jebkad pieredzējusi. Vienas nakts laikā viņš savāc uzticamu vienpadsmit cilvēku komandu, lai aplaupītu trīs populārākos Lasvegasas kazino, kuru īpašnieks ir elegantais un nežēlīgais Terijs Benedikts un kurš satiekas ar Denija bijušo sievu Tesu. Sakritība vai motīvs? Galvenajās lomās: Džordžs Klūnijs, Džūlija Robertsa, Breds Pits.

programme.title: Laika patruļa
programme.desc: Pagaidu aģentu (Ītans Houks) nosūta atpakaļ laikā, lai notvertu teroristu, pirms viņš detonē vairākus spridzekļus un nogalina tūkstošiem nevainīgu cilvēku. Meklējot slepkavu, slepenais aģents kļūst par bārmeni. Bārā viņš iepazīstas ar kādu klientu (Sāra Snūka), kurš izstāsta, kā viņš ticis uzaudzināts kā sieviete un ka viņam atņemts bērns. Kad aģents piedāvā šim cilvēkam atgriezties pagātnē un atrast sava bērna tēvu, klients piekrīt. Abi kopā dodas atpakaļ laikā, lai atriebtu savu pagātni.

programme.title: Sadedzināt pēc izlasīšanas
programme.desc: CIP aģents pēc atlaišanas no darba raksta memuārus. Viņa sieva, kura ierosinājusi laulības šķiršanu, slepus iekopējusi diskā pierakstus un iedevusi advokātei, lai viņa atrastu ko kompromitējošu. Taču advokāte nejauši atstāj disku sporta zāles sieviešu ģērbtuvē, kur darbinieki to atrod. Pieņemot, ka disks satur ārkārtīgi slepenu informāciju, viņi nolemj informāciju pārdot.

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Valts Kovalskis ir tikko zaudējis savu sievu un viņa bērni vēlas ievietot savu tēvu veco ļaužu pansionātā. Būdams ass, cinisks un nekomunukabls, Valts slikti sadzīvo ar aziātu izcelsmes kaimiņiem, pret kuriem Korejas kara veterāns neslēpj savus rasistiskos uzskatus.

programme.title: Hanna
programme.desc: Hannai ir tikai 16 gadu, bet spēkos, izturībā un attapībā viņa var mēroties ar specvienības kareivi. Hanna dziļos Somijas mežos uzaugusi kopā ar tēvu, ar nemitīgiem treniņiem un izturības pārbaudēm viņš tīņu meiteni ir izaudzinājis par perfektu slepkavu.

programme.title: Lepnums un aizspriedumi
programme.desc: Keira Naitlija, Metjū Makfeidens un Donalds Sazerlends pasaulslavenajā Džeinas Ostinas romāna "Lepnums un aizspriedumi" ekranizējumā! Anglija, 18.gadsimta beigas. Piecas māsas Benetas - Elizabete, Džeina, Lidija, Mērija un Kitija aug mātes stingrā uzraudzībā, kura par savu galveno uzdevumu uzskata atrast meitām preciniekus un nodrošināt viņu nākotni. Tomēr enerģiskā un inteliģentā Elizabete tiecas dzīvē sasniegt ko vairāk un savos centienos jūt arī tēva atbalstu. Kad netālajā kaimiņu rezidencē ierodas bagātais vecpuisis Binglija kungs, Benetu mājās sākas rosība. Pavisam drīz Elizabete nejauši sastop pievilcīgo un, kā drīz atklājas, arī snobisko Dārsija kungu.

programme.title: Beigu sajūta
programme.desc: Vīrieti sāk vajāt pagātne - viņš saņem noslēpumainu mantojumu, kas liek viņam pārdomāt savu pašreizējo dzīves situāciju.

programme.title: Visa pasaules nauda
programme.desc: Kad sešpadsmitgadīgais Džons Pols Getijs III tiek nolaupīts, viņa izmisusī māte Geila lūdz jaunekļa vectēvu, naftas magnātu, samaksāt izpirkumu. Kad miljardieris Getijs atsakās, Geila visiem spēkiem mēģina viņu pārliecināt, jo dēla nolaupītāji kļūst arvien brutālāki. Kamēr zēna dzīvība karājas mata galā, negaidīti par Geilas sabiedroto šajā cīņā kļūst Getija konsultants Flečers Čeiss, bijušais CIP darbinieks.

programme.title: Garšīgi
programme.desc: Francija, 1789. gads, īsi pirms revolūcijas. Ar pārsteidzoši talantīgas jaunas sievietes palīdzību pavārs, kuru atlaidis viņa dižciltīgais saimnieks, atrod spēku atbrīvoties no kalpa amata un atver pirmo restorānu pasaulē.

programme.title: Mērija un Makss
programme.desc: 1976. gadā Melburnā vientuļa astoņgadīga meitene uzsāk saraksti ar neparastu vēstuļu draugu - smagi aptaukojušos 44 gadus vecu ņujorkieti ar Aspergera sindromu.

programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone Plus filmām.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Host Laila Ali challenges chefs to settle their disputes in a single round, head-to-head culinary battle. They all come here to call each other out, put their favorite knives on the line, and bury the hatchet. The winners walk out with $10,000 cash, a prized knife from the losing chefs knife roll and bragging rights for life!

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon is all about pork as he fires up the grill for a pork porterhouse, sausage-stuffed peppers, pancetta-loaded greens and a smoky cocktail.

programme.title: Symons Dinners Cooking Out
programme.desc: Michael Symon amps up summer parties with the classic coney dog, barbecue corn ribs and orange strawberry cream pops.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is celebrating two birthdays on the farm -- her husband, Nick, and his dad, Roger. Shes making a lunch menu that features both of their favorites, starting with Nicks favorite Chicken Shawarma Tacos served with a tasty Moroccan Carrot Salad. Dessert is chocoholic Rogers dream sweet treat, Chocolate Tahini Cake with Tahini Frosting. Molly also makes them edible gifts with jars of Hazelnut Sugar Cookie Cereal complete with mini heart-shaped cookies and meringues.

programme.title: Cupcake Championship
programme.desc: Four cupcake connoisseurs battle it out in this cooking competition series, hoping to prove they are the supreme cupcake bakers and take home the $10,000 prize. Each of these contestants are undoubtedly talented cupcake designers, but there can only be one winner, and the heat is on to showcase their artistry and flair when it comes to baking these little sweet treats. Hosted by Kardea Brown, the show give the bakers new challenges to complete in each episode, with the poorest performing contestant eliminated at each stage of the competition, resulting in a final showdown between the very best.

programme.title: Paul Hollywood City Bakes
programme.desc: Paul Hollywood City Bakes is hosted by the British most loved baker, Paul Hollywood, who explores 10 cities around the globe. He is looking for the family bakeries, corner delis and luxury hotels which have created the baking heritage of entire cities. From Cape Town to Reykjavik, Paul will personally guide into the tastiest baking to be found there, each cities own culture and unique history. Exploring the sights of each city Paul gets inspired and creates two unique recipes of his own.

programme.title: Mothers of the War
programme.desc: The documentary tells the stories of five women who lost their children in the war. This film is not only about grief, but also about the ability to preserve the light of memory through the little things: the heroes favorite dishes, plans, and childhood habits. "War Mothers" shows the scale of the tragedy of an entire nation through the prism of five broken but unbreakable maternal destinies.

programme.title: Lielais attālums
programme.desc: Kosmosa kuģirs avarē uz svešas planētas. Izdzīvojušajam astronautam jāšķērso skarbā planēta! Bēgot no nezināmām radībām, viņam jācenšas neiztērēt visu skābekli. Vienīgais kas viņu dzen uz priekšu, ir cerība satikt otru izdzīvojušo.

programme.title: Svaigs
programme.desc: Kad kārtējais randiņš beidzas neveiksmīgi, Noa ir gatava iepazīšanās procesam atmest ar roku. Taču tad viņa satiek Stīvu – un nevis iepazīšanās vietnē, bet vecmodīgā veidā, pie dārzeņu plaukta lielveikalā! Plastikas ķirurgs Stīvs atgriež viņā cerības, ka bruņnieciskums vīriešos nav miris. Svaigi iemīlējusies meitene nepagūst pat aizdomāties, vai Stīvs gadījumā nav pārāk labs, kad ir jau par vēlu. Noa pārliecība, ka meitenes vīriešiem ir kā svaiga gaļa, apstiprinās visšaušalīgākajā veidā.

programme.title: Misters Stikls
programme.desc: Maniakālais Kevins Krambls, kurā mīt veselas 23 personības, sastopas ar ļauno ģēniju Elaidžu Praisu, kuram viņa trauslo kaulu dēļu dota iesauka Misters Stikls, kurš ir apsēsts ar ideju par mesijas supervaroņa atnākšanu. Kad abi apvienojas, ļaundarus var apturēt tikai ar īpašām spējām apveltītais telepāts Deivids Dans.

programme.title: Ex Machina
programme.desc: Jaunais programmētājs Kalebs Smits laimē darba loterijā un saņem priekšnieka piedāvājumu apmeklēt viņa pētniecības centru. Pēc ierašanās un tikšanās ar Nātanu Kalebs uzzina, ka Nātans izstrādā mākslīgo intelektu. Šefs piedāvā Kalebam piedalīties tā sauktajā "Tjūringa testā". Tā Kalebs iepazīstas ar Avu - robotu ar mākslīgo intelektu. Ar katru sesiju Ava Kalebam kļūst arvien tuvāka un skaidrāka. Saziņa ar robotu liek viņam aizdomāties - kas patiesībā testē, kas ar ko manipulē un kas ir viņš pats? Un, ja aiz visa slēpjas mākslīgais intelekts, tad, protams, - "Tjūringa tests" ir izturēts.....

programme.title: Plāns B
programme.desc: Paraugskolniece ir spiesta palīdzēt savai dumpinieciskajai draudzenei sadabūt kontracepcijas tableti pēc ne visai veiksmīga pirmās nakts sakara. Viņas atrodas konservatīvā ASV vidienē, un viņām ir tikai 24 stundas.

programme.title: Sliktais ģēnijs
programme.desc: Grupa vidusskolas pēdējo klašu skolēnu no uzņēmējdarbības programmas apvienojas, lai izjauktu krāpniecisku augstskolu uzņemšanas sistēmu.

programme.title: Pusotrs spiegs
programme.desc: Kelvins Džoiners (Kevins Hārts) skolas laikā bija populārais puisis. Divdesmit gadus vēlāk viņš ir veiksmīgs grāmatvedis, kuru pārsteidz ziņa no Boba Stouna. Izrādās, ka patiesībā viņš ir Robijs Vīrdikts (Dveins Džonsons) – apsmietais tīnis viņa skolā. Bobs ir trenējies divdesmit gadus un šobrīd ir izcils CIP aģents. Viņš algo Kelvinu, lai ar viņa grāmatvedības prasmju palīdzību izsekotu ierīci, kura ASV spiegošanas jomā var radīt jucekli. Dīvainais pāris sastopas ar pārspēku, taču viņiem sanāk arī daži varoņdarbi.

programme.title: Strāvas karš
programme.desc: Dramatisks sāncensības stāsts par elektrības atklāšanas laikmeta titāniem Tomasu Edisonu un Džordžu Vestinghausu, lai noskaidrotu, kura izgudrotā elektriskā sistēma būs noteicošā modernizētajā pasaulē.

programme.title: Kina un Juks: Polārlapsu piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Divu lapsu piedzīvojums laikā, kad tās gatavojas pirmo reizi kļūt par vecākiem un globālā sasilšana maina likumus visiem – gan dabai, gan dzīvniekiem,

programme.title: Lepnā princese
programme.desc: Jaunajam un izskatīgajam karalim Bendžaminam ir pienācis laiks precēties. Viņu savaldzina princeses Karolīnas portrets. Kad princese viņu atraida, karalis, pārģērbies par dārznieku, iekļūst Karolīnas pilī un iekaro viņas sirdi.

programme.title: Atmiņas par nākotni
programme.desc: 1914. gadā, laužot pieņēmumus par sievieti tā laika sabiedrībā, Vera Britena kļūst par Somervilas koledžas studenti Oksfordā. Sākoties Pirmajam pasaules karam, viņas brālis Edvards, līgavainis Rolands Leitons un draugi Viktors un Džefrijs tiek nosūtīti cīnīties frontes priekšējās līnijās. Arī Vera ziedojas un atstāj koledžu, lai dotos līdzi un pievienotos brīvprātīgo mediķu organizācijai, rūpējoties par ievainotajiem un mirstošajiem kareivjiem Londonā, Maltā un Francijā.

programme.title: Gambīts
programme.desc: Mākslas kuratoram Harijam Dīnam ik dienu nākas paciest sava līdz ausīm bagātā priekšnieka Laionela ekscentriskās izdarības. Nu viņš plāno atriebties, taču šim uzdevumam viņam ir vajadzīga karstasinīgas rodeo karalienes Pīdžejas palīdzība. Harijs liek senam draugam izgatavot pazudušas Monē gleznas kopiju un pamudina priekšnieku to "nejauši" ievērot. Ja darījums izdosies, Harijs un viņa līdzdalībnieki būs par dažiem miljoniem mārciņu bagātāki.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: Šajā spriedzes trillerī, kas pacēla latiņu žanra filmām, Brūss Viliss atveido Ņujorkas policistu Džonu Makleinu, kurš Losandželosā ir ieradies pavadīt brīvdienas ar savu sievu Holiju. Bet, kamēr Makleins gaida, līdz beigsies Holijas darba ballīte, ēkā iebrūk teroristi. Grupējuma vadonis Hanss Grūbers ar saviem padotajiem sagrābj ķīlniekus, bet Makleins tikmēr gatavojas pieteikt viena cilvēka karu, un uzvarēt tajā var tikai Makleins!

programme.title: Hitman: Aģents
programme.desc: Aģents 47 (Rūperts Frends) ir elitārs slepkava, kurš no ieņemšanas brīža ir ģenētiski radīts būt par ideālu slepkavu. Viņam uzdod nogalināt noziedzīgā sindikāta vadoni, kurš vēlas uzzināt Aģenta 47 spēju noslēpumus, lai radītu īpaši prasmīgu slepkavu armiju

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Kaskadieris
programme.desc: Kolts ir kaskadieris, un, tāpat kā visi kaskadieri, darbā viņš tiek spridzināts, sašauts, avarē, lec laukā pa logiem un krīt no augstākajām virsotnēm – tas viss mūsu izklaidei. Tagad šim strādnieku šķiras varonim pēc negadījuma, kas teju maksā viņam dzīvību, ir jāatrod pazudusi kinozvaigzne, jāatrisina sazvērestība uzņemšanas laukumā un jāmēģina atgūt mūža mīlestība Džodija, vienlaikus darot savu ikdienas darbu. Kas te var nenoiet greizi?

programme.title: Ingrīda - pašiņu karaliene
programme.desc: Ingrīda (Obrija Plaza) ir īstena sociālo tīklu stalkere, kuras dzīvē viens nejauši nospiests LIKE jau ir pielīdzināms īstai draudzībai, pat ja otra puse par to nemaz nenojauš. Teilore Slouna (Elizabete Olsena) ir atzīta Losandželosas sociālo tīklu karaliene un Instagrama zvaigzne, kuras līdz pēdējam pikselim noslīpētā, perfektā dzīve kļūst par Ingrīdas jaunāko apsēstību. Kad Ingrīda ar viltu ienāk Teilores dzīvē, viņu attiecības no #BFF ātri vien kļūst par #WTF. Un tas ir tikai sākums...

programme.title: Vēl pa vienai
programme.desc: Oskarotā Tomasa Vinterberga filma par četriem draugiem un kolēģiem, ģimnāzijas skolotājiem. Visi četri cīnās ar nemotivētiem skolēniem un jūtas iestrēguši rutīnā. Nikolaja 40 gadu jubilejā draugu sarunas noved pie norvēģu psihiatra Finna Skorderuda teorijas, ka cilvēks dzīvo ar 0,05 promiļu iztrūkumu. Četrotne nolemj veikt eksperimentu un pārbaudīt šo teoriju dzīvē. Tomēr, eksperimentam turpinoties, vīri sastopas katrs ar savu personīgās dzīves izaicinājumu.

programme.title: Tauriņa stāsts
programme.desc: Tuvojoties ziemai, monarhu tauriņi migrē uz dienvidiem, lai pārziemotu siltumā. Taču Patrika spārni vēl nav gatavi tālajam ceļam, un viņš nevar lidot. Nedomādams padoties, Patriks kopā ar savu labāko draugu kāpuru Mārtiju paslēpjas pārtikas treilerī, kuru velk Dženifera. Tomēr arī viņai ir savas bažas par ceļojumu, jo - tauriņam neierasti - viņu māc bailes no augstuma. Visus trīs gaida daudz piedzīvojumu un sūri gūtu mācību, līdz mērķis būs sasniegts.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Grū ģimenē ir papildinājums - Grū juniors. Kad tētis Grū sastopas ar jaunu ienaidnieku – atriebīgo Maksimu Lemālu un viņa liktenīgo sievieti Valentīnu –, visa ģimene ir spiesta atstāt mājas, doties uz slepeno mītni skaistajā Meifloverā un mēģināt iekļauties vietējā sabiedrībā zem slepena vārda. Taču te ir kāds, kas zina, kas patiesībā ir Grū, un piedzīvojumi var sākties!

programme.title: Naudas cena: Largo Vinča piedzīvojums
programme.desc: Largo Vinčs izmisīgi meklē savu nolaupīto dēlu, saprotot, ka pēdas pie tiem, kas izraisījuši viņa bankrotu, varētu aizvest arī pie Largo dēla.

programme.title: Zaķu skola: Misija Olas
programme.desc: Īsi pirms Lieldienām svinīgā rituālā maģiskā Zelta ola palīdz noskaidrot zaķu čempionus. Un pirmo reizi zaķu skolas vēsturē izvēlēts arī pilsētas zaķis - un tas ir Makss! Vaļoties Maksam vairs itin nemaz nav laika, jo viņam kopā ar Lieldienu zaķa draugiem jāpilnveido savas prasmes. Tomēr pirms paša pirmā treniņa zaķu maģiskā spēka avots Zelta ola kļūst melna. Pie vainas ir bandas vadonis Leo, kurš nevēlas, lai Lieldienas notiku. Ko nu?!

programme.title: Bada garša
programme.desc: Kāds pāris ziedo visu, tikai lai saņemtu visaugstāko atzinību pavārmākslas pasaulē — Michelin zvaigzni.

programme.title: Rūķi atgriežas atkal
programme.desc: Helvijas pasaule sagriežas kājām gaisā, kad viņa atklāj, ka pastāv tehniski attīstītu rūķu banda no Vīnes, kas, pretstatā Helvijas klanam, ir nepārspējami jautrības un piedzīvojumu meklētāji. Vai Helvijas draudzība ar Bo, jaunāko no rūķu bandas, spēs samierināt abus rūķu klanus pēc vairāk nekā 250 gadu pārtraukuma?

programme.title: Nabaga radības
programme.desc: Sava nežēlīgā vīra ietekmē Bella (Emma Stouna) ir izdarījusi pašnāvību, taču ekscentrisks zinātnieks (Vilems Defo) nolemj izglābt sievieti un pārstāda viņai pašas vēl nedzimušā bērna smadzenes. Viņa aizbildniecībā Bella alkst mācīties un iepazīt dzīvi, kas Viktorijas laikmeta stingrajā sabiedrībā viņai līdz šim bijusi liegta. Kopā ar viltīgo un valdzinoši cinisko juristu Dankanu Vederbērnu viņa dodas ceļojumā pāri kontinentiem. Ceļojuma laikā Bella arvien vairāk atbrīvojas no sava laikmeta aizspriedumiem un sabiedrības ierobežojumiem.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Kas mani ved pie tevis
programme.desc: Džeina un Vils, izdeguši savu iepriekšējo romantisko sattiecību dēļ, satiekas kāzās, un bremzes nostrādā tikai mirkli pirms abu seksa garderobē. Viņi nolemj izstāstīt viens otram par savu pagātni, zinot, ka iespēja būt kopā ir gandrīz neticama.

programme.title: Kapteinis Fantastika
programme.desc: Viņi prot vairākas valodas un ir izglītoti dažādās zinātnēs. Viņi prot medīt un rīkoties ar ieročiem. Viņi dzīvo mežā un atrodas pilnīgā harmonijā ar dabu. Un tikai apstākļu sakritība liek viņiem pamest savu paradīzi un doties uz lielo pilsētu. Kas notiks tad, kad viņi sastapsies ar civilizāciju un nāksies izbaudīt visus modernās dzīves plusus un mīnusus?

programme.title: Futbols: Serie A. Napoli - Parma
programme.desc: Coverage of Italys top-flight football league.

programme.title: Futbols: Bundesliga. Stuttgart - Eintracht
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

programme.title: Hokejs: Šveices Nacionālā līga. Lausanne - Geneve
programme.desc: The National League is a professional ice hockey league in Switzerland and is the top tier of the Swiss league system.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Dubai Basketball - Virtus Bologna
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: NBA Action. 3513. raidījums
programme.desc: Interesting sports magazine that gives viewers a chance to find out all the latest NBA news, and see all the exciting action and top highlights from the matches.

programme.title: NBA. Dallas Mavericks - Denver Nuggets
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Levante - Espanyol
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Ligue 1. PSG - Lille
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.desc: Christina Anstead and Tarek El Moussa are Californian realtors, ex-spouses and the hosts of Flip or Flop show, which is the original show in the Flip or Flop franchise. The hosts buy neglected homes, mainly bank-owned, short sales or foreclosures, to renovate and resell them. It is often buying a pig in a poke, as they never know until they start renovation what the real condition of the estate is. It is a risky business, some houses require minimal investments, while some are the worst nightmare. Tarek and Christina arent afraid of any hardships and every time work hard to sell at a profit.

programme.desc: A couples big gamble to renovate a rundown home in their ski town means a few steps back financially, but a leap forward in their relationship.

programme.title: The Flip Off
programme.desc: Tarek El Moussa and Christina Haack built a home-flipping empire and top HGTV series with Flip or Flop—but it all came crashing down after their much-publicized divorce. Now, Tarek and Christina are back in the networks new highly anticipated series The Flip Off, a throwdown competition to see which ex can find, buy, renovate and flip a house for the biggest financial gain.

programme.title: Mexico Life
programme.desc: Mexico is a country unlike many others; gorgeous climate, a Caribbean coastline, vibrant cities, and unimaginable history. This American reality series follows prospective homebuyers as they venture into this Central American paradise to find their dream property, with the help of expert realtors. Whatever their reasons for moving; sun, sand, surf or simply a change of scenery, the realtors aid the buyers every step of the way, helping them to locate ideal properties that they can either move into or enjoy as a holiday home. Follow the couples and families as they set off on a Mexican adventure that will change their lives forever.

programme.title: Build Me Up
programme.desc: Forgetting your ex isnt so easy when your whole house reminds you of them. Everywhere you turn, theres that horrible wall paper they insisted on getting, pictures of your holidays together, they even painted your front door their favourite colour. Thats where designer Orlando Soria comes in. Orlando considers himself somewhat a break-up expert, and hes determined to give these newly single clients houses the new lease of life that they so desperately need, allowing them to move on from their ex.

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Phoenix-based TV reporters learn the ropes of buying and running a ranch. Plus, a Dallas couple set their sights on chickens, pecans and lots of land.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: Jonathan and Drew take on a couple with two daughters and more than 10 pets. Plus, a family looks for a smart investment with cowboy charm.

programme.title: Renovation
programme.desc: Lindsey and Kirsten rescue a teachers home after a major fire. Then, the sisters respond to long-time clients when 19 of their radiators burst.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Vacation House for Free is a reality TV show hosted by Matt Blashaw, real estate expert and licensed contractor with fantastic handyman skills he gained while working at his fathers lumberyard through college. Matt makes dreams come true for those who want to buy a vacation house and be mortgage free, he teaches them how to use rental income to cover the costs of owning it. Matt finds a property at a right price, renovates it and places it on the rental market. So his clients can get income when not living there and by doing so they get it for free.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Unsellable Houses
programme.desc: Real estate consultants and twin sisters Leslie Davis and Lyndsay Lamb have a knack for helping desperate homeowners sell their lifeless homes. After visiting nearby comparables, the sisters make the necessary, impactful renovations that convert these unlovable houses into diamonds in the rough.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: Castle Impossible
programme.desc: The couple convert the solar into a studio apartment. It has a lot of potential but first they must clear out the dirt, rotted timber and flies.

programme.title: Living Aloha
programme.desc: Kamohai and Tristyn find a hidden gem in Kaneohe. They transform the modest space into a beautiful blend of nature and island living.

programme.title: Chasing the West
programme.desc: California State Rangers turn to the brothers for a property that reminds them of park life, and a couple are ready to flee their small rental.

programme.title: Fix My Frankenhouse
programme.desc: Mike and Denese strive to fix a house whose additions gained lots of space, but little function, for a nervous client with a Thanksgiving deadline.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: Bradley Walsh: Egypts Cosmic Code
programme.desc: Written in the Stars. Bradley Walsh sets up his lifelong fascination with Ancient Egypt in this first episode. As an ex-Rolls Royce engineer, Bradley has many questions about Egypts biggest icons - the Pyramids.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
programme.desc: Weve heard the tales of great wars fought with groundbreaking weaponry, but what about everything else in between? From missiles manned by pigeons to an incendiary device made to look like one of Americas favourite pastimes.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Beyond Oak Island
programme.desc: From the producers of "The Curse of Oak Island" and "The UnXplained" comes an exciting new documentary series, "Beyond Oak Island." Hosted by real-life treasure hunters Rick and Marty Lagina, this eight episode series chronicles the greatest treasure hunts of the past, present and (perhaps) future. "Beyond Oak Island" offers a combination of great story telling, compelling interviews with treasure-hunters, historians and experts, as well as on-location treasure hunts in progress, sometimes with the Laginas themselves. From pirates such as Blackbeard and outlaws like Jesse James, to Aztec gold, priceless historical artifacts from American history and sunken treasure ships, "Beyond Oak Island" digs deep into the many treasure quests across the globe, revealing amazing new details and clues from past searches - and in some cases, advancing the hunt.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: From the producers of Ancient Aliens® and The Curse of Oak Island® From alleged UFO encounters to sudden disappearances to evil possessions, series host William Shatner attempts to get to the truth behind the most bizarre and mysterious events ever reported. With the help of the worlds top scientists, first-hand "experiencer" accounts, and dramatic reenactments, viewers gain shocking insight into whats really happening--and why.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: HISTORYs hit series, PAWN STARS, enters viewers inside the door of a family run pawnshop in Las Vegas, where three generations of men from the Harrison family grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey jointly run the business, with clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. This family lives and breathes the pawning business, using their sharp-eyed skills to carefully assess the value of items their colorful customers bring in, ranging from the obscure to the truly historical objects.

programme.title: Pawn Stars Do America
programme.desc: Rick, Corey, and Chum hit the road to meet collectors from all over the country. Their first stop: Denver, Colorado, where Rick goes buck-ing broncos wild for a couple of antique cars, while Corey and Chum aim to stake their claim at a gold mine.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: The Ultimate Evidence
programme.desc: Ancient Astronaut theorist, Giorgio Tsoukalos, shares his insight on massive stone structures and strange, giant figures known as Monoliths. What compelled ancient man to move colossal stones and to build stone monuments all around the world?

programme.title: Bradley Walsh: Egypts Cosmic Code
programme.desc: Written in the Stars. Bradley Walsh sets up his lifelong fascination with Ancient Egypt in this first episode. As an ex-Rolls Royce engineer, Bradley has many questions about Egypts biggest icons - the Pyramids.

programme.title: The UnBelievable with Dan Aykroyd
